dmca.title: SFWA Upset Over Stories Posted on Google
dmca.body:
[private]
Chair, Electronic Piracy Committee
Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers of America
[private]
Golden, CO 80402
[private]@sfwa.org

September 6, 2002

Google, Inc.
Attn: User Support, DMCA complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Via fax to [private], Attn: User Support, DMCA complaints

Re: Copyright Infringement of the Literary Works of Harlan Ellison, Neil Gaiman, and Lois McMaster Bujold

I have been appointed by Mr. Harlan Ellison, Mr. Neil Gaiman and Ms. Lois McMaster Bujold to represent them in the following matter. They are the copyright owners of the respective literary works listed below. It has come to our attention that these literary works are posted as full text electronic files on your server. This publication is not authorized by the copyright owners, any agent thereof, or any law. The identifying information is set forth below: Each authors' work is listed by the identifying substring of the Subject: header followed by the Usenet Message-ID headers containing those works (they were posted in segments):

HARLAN ELLISON:LOVE AIN'T NOTHING
	&lt7145f36aa27811aa3f53634e76302941@xganon.com>
	&lt45b9557644da4e4752f152bd396a6fee@melontraffickers.com>
	&lt1c395955479b1c0003a455ef1c769919@remailer.privacy.at>
	&ltf27293285f5cf5c51bfc9l2adf4333df@mfn.org>
	&ltd930768277e5f6953ebfd57f49254500@remailer.havenco.com>
	&lt5df97915898424770ec8737245505446@mfn.org>

"Don't Panic" (A BIOGRAPHY OF DOUGLAS ADAMS) by Neil Gaiman
	&lt8226e5d65bO168b52459dd1bacda3198@remailer.havenco.com>
	&ltdb9e07f8fb0831d63cb5bdf3e4bc9326@paranoici.org>
	&ltf5bdc7b04b05f01bae00b956c345cb0d@anonymous.poster>
	&lt0c33b6a3c47c023028297f346b389748@remailer.xganon.com>

Lois McMaster Bujold - FALLING FREE 
Bujold: The Warrior's Apprentice 
THE VOR GAME by Bujold 
Bujold:CETEGANDA

These authors respectfully request that you remove the infringing material within 48 hours and take whatever other action may be required to promptly stop this illegal infringement.. They further understand that pursuant to the following laws -- Digital Millennium Copyright Act - H.R.2281; Public Law: 105-304 (10/28/98)), No Electronic Theft Act (LaMacchia Bill) - H.R.2265 Public Law: 105-147 (12/16/97), Copyright Act of 1976, as Amended (1994) - 17 USCS
